actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to establish a field office of the United States Customs Service and the Immigration and Naturalization Service at Glacier International Airport.

summary.text: Designates Glacier International Airport in Kalispell, Montana, an international airport of entry. Directs the Commissioner of Customs, in conjunction with the Commissioner of the Immigration and Naturalization Service, to establish and staff a field office at such airport. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to establish a field office of the United States Customs Service and the Immigration and Naturalization Service at Glacier International Airport.
